entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 22. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 70%
